definition: to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Typical goods moved are high demand, high value, perishable .
sentences.chinese: 典型的货物搬到高要求，高价值，易腐烂变质。

sentences.english: The neo-Archean rocks possibly exist in Tieklik metamorphic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 铁克力克可能有新太古代变质岩系的存在。

sentences.english: The brine is of the composite formation mechanism of sedimentary transformation and the dissolution and filtration of solid potassium salts.
sentences.chinese: 卤水为沉积变质水和固态钾盐溶滤水的复合成因。

sentences.english: When Henrik and his German father become Nazis , the family had changed.
sentences.chinese: 当汉力克与他的德藉父亲参加纳粹后，家族变质。

sentences.english: The subducted slabs was metamorphosed to water-bearing eclogite before being melted.
sentences.chinese: 该俯冲板片熔融前通常变质为含水的榴辉岩。

sentences.english: Society has changed, the need to reinstall system.
sentences.chinese: 社会已经变质，地球需要重装系统了。

sentences.english: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks in Northern Fujian are the important part consisting of the Cathaysian palaeocontinental basement.
sentences.chinese: 闻北前寒武纪变质岩是华夏古陆基底的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The influence of SG inoculant on graphitizing annealing of malleable cast iron was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了SG变质剂对可锻铸铁石墨化退火的影响。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Tianzhu mountain area has become a model place for geoscientific research on Dabie mountain ultrahigh pressure metamorphic zone.
sentences.chinese: 天柱山地区因而成为大别山超高压变质带的立典之地。

sentences.english: It shields oil from spoilage-inducing heat and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 它保护油不受热和氧气的影响而变质。

sentences.english: The modification effects of low-carbon ferrochromium and rare-earth ferrosilicon take second place.
sentences.chinese: 低碳铬铁和稀土硅铁的变质效果次之。

sentences.english: Raw eggs are highly perishable and must be chilled before and after cooking.
sentences.chinese: 生鸡蛋非常容易变质，烹制前后必须冷藏。

sentences.english: Apart from these young Danxia landforms, a variety of metamorphic rocks can also be viewed at the source of the Laodao River.
sentences.chinese: 捞刀河源头区除了这年轻的丹霞，还有各种变质岩。

sentences.english: I put the veal scallops into the refrigerator before they could spoil.
sentences.chinese: 在小牛肉可能变质前，我把它们搁在冰箱里。

sentences.english: The process of alternating solid rock masses is called metamorphism .
sentences.chinese: 固体岩体变换的过程即所谓变质作用。

sentences.english: The highest metamorphic facies in the zone reached amphibolite facies.
sentences.chinese: 带内最高变质相达角闪岩相。

definition: (milk) to turn sour/(meat, fish) to go off
date of use (on foodstuffs)/best before date
to be overdue/to exceed the time limit/to expire (as in expiration date)
to become tainted with the smell of sth else/to pick up an odor
